thread.title: Andrew Gomez
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Andrew Gomez

author: Andrew Gomez
title: Andrew Gomez
text: I went in simply to look around and price things. The sales person (initials EAL, I wish I could remember her name, Waco,TX location) promptly and patiently showed me around the entire selection, and even priced everything for me (with tax included). After looking at several options, I went ahead and chose a set after she convinced me how awesome it looked, to which I agreed. She was able to help me spend under my budget and made the buying process simple! I can't wait to get my new bedroom furniture on Saturday!
